messages.title: It’s Dorothy or the Tories here in Watford
messages.content: The town's popular mayor Dorothy Thornhill is standing and winnning.

messages.title: Investing in our Children's future
messages.content: A Mayor of Watford Dorothy Thornhill made sure young people have best possible start.

messages.title: Council tax update
messages.content: - another freeze from Lib Dem borough council - but county Tories approve maximum tax increase and cut key services

messages.title: Stop the Tory bus cuts
messages.content: LOCAL Liberal Democrats are fighting to stop Conservative county council forcing through unwanted bus cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By making land available through a key council project, Dorothy played a key role in securing major hospital facilities.
The Liberal Democrats in Watford delivered investment in hospital facilities with an £8 million boost in NHS spending by 2020.
Extra investment to improve mental health services. Work to upgrade mental health wards at Leavesden Hospital. Opened new mental health treatment centre.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour trail in third place. At the last parliamentary election, the Lib Dems were narrowly behind the Conservatives.

issues.education: Investing in our Children's future - A Mayor of Watford Dorothy Thornhill made sure young people have best possible start.
issues.governance: Council tax update - another freeze from Lib Dem borough council but county Tories approve maximum tax increase and cut key services
issues.health: Securing our hospital's future - Dorothy played a key role in securing major hospital facilities. Investing in hospital facilities - The Liberal Democrats in Watford delivered investment.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dorothy and the Liberal Democrats have shown that they put our hospital and NHS first...

politicalExperience.achievements: Made sure young people have best possible start. Freeze from Lib Dem borough council. Fought Conservative county council bus cuts.
